notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: BL and SP 1 conceived the original idea for this research project and dually serve as principal investigators. EH conducted metabolite extractions, HPTLC and LC–MS/MS analyses. MS designed the LC–MS/MS approach as part of the central analytical facility services (CAF) at Stellenbosch University. JK provided student support in the form of a scholarship. SP 3 provided intellectual input as a human cancer specialist. All authors (EH, MS, JK, SC, SP 1, SP 3, BL) contributed equally to the writing of this research note. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
